description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Chef Tamara Ferry prepares three delicious recipes with an emphasis on healthy eating, minimal calories and good taste. Each recipe is shown step by step and will tickle the taste buds. The recipes are: pesto tarts with glazed leeks and smoked salmon, grilled szechuan brochettes and individual orange souffles cooked in their own shells.
